overview.en: Digital Islands And Opportunities takes the Megi Islands, known as the 800 Islands, as a starting point, and combines block chain technology to extend horizontally to the island's tourism, consumption, hotels, gambling, water entertainment and other offline scenes.
overview.zh: DIAO以号称“八百岛屿”的墨吉(华人称为丹老)群岛为切入点，结合区块链技术，横向延展到岛上的旅游、消费、酒店、博彩、水上娱乐等多个线下场景。
